The people in the photo are playing baseball, a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each. The objective of the game is to score runs by hitting a thrown ball with a bat and touching a series of four bases arranged at the corners of a ninety-foot diamond.

The people in this photo are playing baseball, a bat-and-ball game in which two teams of nine players each take turns batting and fielding. The game is played on a field with four bases, with the home plate at the center.
